turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, these are always so hard. Okay, um... In my previous role at Acme Corp, we were building a new recommendation engine. I refactored the queries using indexes and optimized the core algorithm using dynamic programming, which reduced the recommendation generation time to under a second. I also implemented caching to further improve performance. Does that sound like a decent answer?
